page.title: 09The Local Press
page.content: Burton has three local newspapers. Two of them, the "Trader" and the "Advertiser" are free weekly papers, with some articles but mainly advertisements. The "Burton Daily Mail", though, is the only daily paper and provides lots of useful information. It is a good paper to read and catch up with the latest gossip. The front page has big black letters which make out the main story. The second page has personal announcements. Every Monday there is a gardening page. Every now and again there is a schools corner, with information about local schools. Each day there is an "Out of Doors" column, a crossword and a horoscope. At the back there are reports on local sports. The Burton Mail has lots of photographs in it.
